defaultConstructor.summary: Create an instance with default initialization.

staticConstructor.summary: The static constructor of this class.
The static constructor of this struct.

method.name: ToString
method.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object with the specified format string.

operator.name: op_Equality
operator.summary: Indicates whether two instances have a same value.

operator.name: op_Inequality
operator.summary: Indicates whether two instances have two different values.

operator.name: op_GreaterThan
operator.summary: Indicates whether the left value is greater than the right value.

operator.name: op_LessThan
operator.summary: Indicates whether the left value is less than the right value.

operator.name: op_GreaterThanOrEqual
operator.summary: Indicates whether the left value is greater than or equals to the right value.

operator.name: op_LessThanOrEqual
operator.summary: Indicates whether the left value is less than or equals to the right value.
